description:
Looking for a cool and relaxing challenge to kill time while at work, school or stuck in traffic? 

Do you ever find yourself competing against yourself and you peers to see who can throw a paper ball the furthest?! Then this is the perfect app that will for sure keep you entertained! 

The idea is a very simple one, but the challenge is not! In different scenarios you will have to "throw" the paper ball (or a similar object) with a finger swipe and try to make it land inside the basket. As simple as that! Or is it? You will need to check it out for yourself! 


Features eigtht (8) different scenarios: 

- Classroom 
- Laundry
- Bathroom 
- Casino 
- Office 
- Kitchen 
- Bedroom 
- Alley 

Let's toss the paper!
This app comes equipped with amazing graphics, we are sure you will love it! 

We are constantly developing new and exciting apps; please feel free to share with us any ideas or suggestions you may have!
